simple_conversation.description: Each standard conversation is billed at 3 credits.

web_research.description: If the AI determines that web research is necessary during a conversation, an additional 2 credits will be added to the basic conversation fee.

web_search.description: If the AI performs a web search as part of the conversation, an additional 1 credit will be added to the basic conversation fee.

document_input_processing.description: If the AI processes a document as part of the conversation, an additional 2 credits will be added to the basic conversation fee. For now we can only process PDF files Max 5MB and Max 10 pages long.

image_generation.description: If the AI performs image generation as part of the conversation, an additional 5 credits will be added to the basic conversation fee.

image_input_processing.description: If the AI needs to process an image provided by the user as part of the conversation, an additional 2 credits will be added to the basic conversation fee.

respond_with_sound.description: If the AI responds with a sound recording, an additional 2 credits will be added to the basic conversation fee.

sound_input_processing.description: If the AI needs to process a sound provided by the user as part of the conversation, an additional 2 credits per sound length minute will be added to the basic conversation fee. For now we can only process WhatsApp voice recordings/notes.

text_to_text_translation.description: If the AI needs to translate text as part of the conversation, an additional 1 credit will be added to the basic conversation fee.

generate_video.description: If the AI needs to generate a video as part of the conversation, an additional 300 credits will be added to the basic conversation fee.
